newsitem.title: USA: DSP Group sees Q4 revenue boost.
newsitem.headline: DSP Group sees Q4 revenue boost.

text.p: DSP Group Inc said Tuesday it licensed its TrueSpeech products to Rockwell International Corp and expects net income of about $4.4 million from Rockwell in its fourth quarter.
Earlier DSP reported a third quarter net loss of $263,000 or $0.03 a share, compared to profits of $2.49 million or $0.26 a share in the year-ago period.
In the latest quarter DSP recorded a charge of $1.529 million for acquired in-process technology related to the acquisition of Aptel Ltd.
DSP develops speech processing algorithms, telephony algorithms and digital signal processors.
